casebody.data:
In the Matter of BROCK, et al.
v.
PIERCE. No. 181P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Brock & Scott, Charlotte, for Brock & Scott.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of April 2008 by Defendant for Writ of Quo Warranto:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
